title: Travel agency booking invoices and itinerary confirmations
dataVerified: Traveler names, full itinerary, booking references, prices, agency, commission
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Booking status (confirmed/completed/cancelled). Link to travel agency system (traveler and suppliers, requires authentication)
rationale: Prevents fake travel agency bookings. Domain binding verifies travel agency. Complex itinerary verification (flights+hotels+cars). Agency liability documentation. Multi-page: Itineraries multi-page with detailed bookings.
